author: Flo (tonebytone)
content: You two crack me up! Here I thought I was the only one who did stuff like that! Ever been out without a battery in the camera? Either way, without a card or a battery, the camera is useless. I just bought a spare SD card for the Fuji X100 - it hasn't even been taken out of the ridiculous plastic container that's so hard to open! Where IS it? Sigh! I know I did get in the house with it.
